text:
Sharon Begley (June 14, 1956 – January 16, 2021) was an American journalist. She was the senior science writer for "Stat", a publication from "The Boston Globe". She regularly contributed articles to the "Yale Scientific Magazine" while at University. She was born in Englewood, New Jersey.
Begley died on January 16, 2021 in Boston, Massachusetts at the age of 64.
